faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Most asked questions and answers about Mail Management.

q1.question: Is Mail Management free?
q1.answer: Yes, the basic features of Mail Management are completely free. We also have premium subscription plans for more advanced features.

q2.question: How is the security of my email accounts ensured?
q2.answer: Mail Management provides secure access to your accounts with OAuth2 protocol. Your passwords are never stored on our servers and all data is encrypted.

q3.question: Which email services are supported?
q3.answer: Currently Gmail, Outlook and School Mail system are supported. More services will be added soon.

q4.question: How can I add my email account?
q4.answer: After logging into your account, you can select the email service you want from the "Add Account" section and connect your account with a few clicks.

q5.question: Can I use Mail Management on my mobile device?
q5.answer: Yes, Mail Management is fully mobile compatible and accessible from all devices through your browser. Special applications for iOS and Android will also be released soon.

q6.question: Is my data safe in Mail Management?
q6.answer: Yes, we apply the highest security standards. All data is encrypted end-to-end and we have GDPR compliant data protection policies.
